title: The Last Molecule
alt: Biology is really struggling; they're barely at 93% and they keep finding more ants.
transcript:
[Ponytail is presenting on a stage. To the top-center of the slide which Ponytail is pointing to, there is a circled "100% complete" under "Chemistry", then to the left is "Biology" which is at "93% complete" and to the right is "Physics" which is at "98% complete". The bottom of the slide shows the structural formula of a molecule which is captioned "The Last One", along with a few smaller captions around it drawn as squiggles.]Ponytail: With the discovery of the last molecule, I'm pleased to announce that chemistry is finally complete.
Ponytail: Best of luck to our competitors in their race for second place.
